required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single and Multiple Ascending Dose Study of COR588
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, First-in-Human, Single- and Multiple-Ascending Dose Study Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Oral COR588 in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single and multiple ascending dose study to assess the safety and tolerability of COR588 HCl in healthy male and female subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment emergent adverse events.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through Day 8 for the single ascending dose phase and through Day 19 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of the incidence and severity of treatment-emergent adverse events.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in chemistry lab measures (Sodium [Na], Blood Urea Nitrogen [BUN], Calcium [Ca], Total bilirubin).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through Day 8 for the single ascending dose phase and through Day 19 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in serum chemistry measures.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in hematology lab measures (red blood cell count [RBC], hemoglobin [Hgb], hematocrit [Hct]).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through Day 8 for the single ascending dose phase and through Day 19 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in hematology measures.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in urinalysis lab parameters (pH, specific gravity, glucose).
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through Day 8 for the single ascending dose phase and through Day 19 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of changes in urinalysis parameters.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: To Day 3 for the single ascending dose phase and to Day 11 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
To Day 3 for the single ascending dose phase and to Day 11 for the multiple ascending dose phase.
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum observed drug concentration during a dosing interval

secondary_outcome.time_frame: To Day 3 for the single ascending dose phase and to Day 11 for the multiple ascending dose phase.

intervention.description: Increasing doses of COR588 will be administered for cohorts 1-4 in the single ascending dose phase and for cohorts 1-4 in the multiple ascending dose phase.
Placebo will be administered for cohorts 1-4 in the single ascending dose phase and for cohorts 1-4 in the multiple ascending dose phase.
